headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Week on the Podium: Truffade Z-Type
content: Toss the valet your keys and visit The Diamond Casino & Resort to give the Lucky Wheel a spin. Its bounties include GTA$, RP, clothing, snacks, and all kinds of mystery prizes. This week’s jackpot? The Truffade Z-Type, a throwback to yesteryear’s idea of luxury. You might need a pocket watch and monocle to complete the look.
